title: U.S. Space Command to bring commercial firms into classified wargame on nuclear threats in space
description:
Upcoming tabletop exercise will examine response to weapons of mass destruction in orbit

The post U.S. Space Command to bring commercial firms into classified wargame on nuclear threats in space appeared first on SpaceNews.
